document.full_text: u.s. carmaker chrysler is planning to close a deal to refinance $7.5 billion of government debt by may 24, according to details of chrysler's offering memorandum to the banks published on thursday by newspaper il sole 24 ore.
document.title: chrysler to close refinancing deal by may 24: report
lines_and_colors: u.s. carmaker chrysler is planning to close a deal to refinance $7.5 billion of government debt by may 24, according to details of chrysler's offering memorandum to the banks published on thursday by newspaper il sole 24 ore.
